data.name: ultimate donar
data.description:
You work for a donation acceptace killing somethingy company...
Your job is to tell your boss the name of all the 'Ultimate donor thingy people'.
A donor is given the title 'Ultimate donor thingy people' if he appears in the list more than `n / 2` times.
Your job :
``` Given a function (solution) which has two parameter "amount" and "donorString", where amount is the total amount of donors and donorString is the list of donors. The names are seperated by a space and are in the form of string and not an array(beware..). Return the name that appears in the string more than (number of donors / 2) times. If there is none return "conspiracy". ``` Horrible plot twists : 
1). You are not allowed to import libraries / modules.
2). Do it in less than or equal to ( 140 characters Ruby ) ( and 90 Python )
All translations and Fixes are welcome.
